Text:
Oops - I see a couple of duplications and an out-of-scope book has crept in:

Tears of a Clown_ Glenn Beck and the Tea Bagging of America - Milbank, Dana.mobi

I guess it's easy to see how Dummies could be associated with Glenn Beck... 0.o
Or rather, it's easy to see how Dana Milbank could be associated with Dummies.
I guess if you're a Beck ditto-head, anybody that thinks differently to you is a dummy...
No, Beck is definitely associated with Dummies. Milbank is a really smart guy.
If Glenn Beck were European, he'd definitely be categorized as a fascist. The End.
